description: Unified reference manifest for the EV0L Codex Infinity bundle, prepared for MetaVault 5100 anchoring.

charter.title: EV0L Codex Infinity Charter
charter.purpose: Illuminated charter of laws, glyphs, schema, and seals.

charter_schema.title: EV0L Codex Infinity Schema
charter_schema.purpose: Canonical schema for AI and ENFT interaction.

bleu_bills_compendium.title: BLEU Bills Compendium
bleu_bills_compendium.purpose: Stand-alone illuminated scroll of all Bleu Bills Shades.

bleu_bills_ledger.title: BLEU Bills Ledger
bleu_bills_ledger.purpose: Machine ledger of each Bleu Bill and its treasury role.

codex_heads.title: EV0L Codex Provenance Headers
codex_heads.purpose: Hash provenance (SHA-256 + Keccak-256) for the Infinity Charter and schema.

bleu_bills_heads.title: BLEU Bills Provenance Headers
bleu_bills_heads.purpose: Hash provenance (SHA-256 + Keccak-256) for the Bleu Bills compendium and ledger.

metavault_5100.hash_phase: Compute SHA-256 and Keccak-256 for all bundle files and commit to provenance manifests.
metavault_5100.mint_phase: Upload bundle artifacts, compute manifestCID, and anchor the Merkle root via ProvenanceRegistry.

archive_phase.physical: Print ceremonial scrolls for the Charter and Compendium.

auto_expansion.new_bleu_bills: Self-register under bleu_bills_v‚àû with dynamic shade assignment.
auto_expansion.new_languages: Append translation blocks under law_translations with seal regeneration.
auto_expansion.new_realms_or_planets: Spawn realm_index nodes inheriting Infinity Core schema.
auto_expansion.future_treasuries: Increment compound yield formula without ceiling.
auto_expansion.temporal_updates: Log new cycles or epochs as time_revision entries while preserving prior hashes.

notes: All hash fields default to null until the Hash Phase locks their values.
CID placeholders should be replaced with final ipfs:// references once minted.
This manifest is designed to be referenced as a single MetaVault 5100 object for perpetual growth.
